page.title: 03SEDGEFIELD SHOW and HUNT
page.content: The{Annual Show}has been going for one hundred and thirty two years.It takes place behind the village fire station. The things that go on show are horses,dairy cattle,garden produce,old cars, stalls, horse jumping and judging handicraft.The pupils in our school take part in the handwriting competition. {The Hunt}officially known as The South Durham Hunt was established in 1872.The Hunt starts from outside the Nags Head Public House and leaves the village by way of Spring Lane.This route takes the hunt out of the village towards open farmland and Foxton.
